subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A report on the Texas Rangers’ Web site said that the team had struck a deal with the free-agent outfielder Vladimir Guerrero on a one-year contract with a club option for 2011.
snippet: A report on the Texas Rangers’ Web site said that the team had struck a deal with the free-agent outfielder Vladimir Guerrero on a one-year contract with a club option for 2011.
